description: New Hampshire police say they seized drugs 80 pot plants and the street drug Molly which estimated to be about $190,000 worth of drugs.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: Canna-busted: Were two Michigan cops breaking the law with having pot butter?
description: Michigans Supreme Court is looking into the 2014 case of two officers with medicinal marijuana cards who got busted with cannabutter.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: A first: Man fights city of Denver in long court battle, claims pot sales license
description: A different district judge ruled that the city had no right to retroactively apply new rules to a business that had applied for a license under old rules.
creator: John Aguilar

title: Want to work with weed? Heres the straight dope on marijuana jobs
description: As public support and legalization of cannabis spreads, those who have quietly marijuana jobs are slowly emerging from the shadows.
creator: Brooke Edwards Staggs

title: Dont freak out: Expert advice for parents about teen pot use
description: Ask the Cannabist recently got a question from the mother of a 13-year-old who is getting high; the mom wants to know about the effects of teen pot use.
creator: By The Cannabist Staff

title: Vape pen maker: California likely to legalize, but by a smaller margin than some expect
description: As California sits poised for the possibility of legal recreational pot, Bloom Farms founder Mike Ray thinks it will pass, but by a smaller margin than expected.
creator: By The Cannabist Staff

title: Are NFL officials just paying lip service on CBD research?
description: Jake Plummer hoped the league would initiate a discussion about the studies that hes pushed for and that Eugene Monroe, an offensive tackle with the Baltimore Ravens, has helped to fund.
creator: Nicki Jhabvala

title: Arkansas marijuana legalization hot ballot issue, but is competition bad thing?
description: Depending on how things fall, voters might have a chance to consider multiple Arkansas marijuana-related proposals this fall.
creator: Andrew Demillo

title: Unhappy hunters, conservationists sue saying pot cultivation poisons wildlife
description: A group of conservationists and hunters is suing Mendocino County after it loosened restrictions on the cultivation of medical marijuana.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: State university gives a big NO to pot leaf on T-shirt
description: MU NORML wanted to raise money by selling T-shirts and asked the universitys permission, but was rejected.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: Sales skyrocket for New Mexicos medical marijuana industry
description: New Mexico dispensaries are struggling to keep up with the high demand. One dispensary sees about 300 patients daily at its current facility.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: This high-level politician just made an incredibly credible case for legalization
description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau recently made one of the more buttoned-down, straight-edged arguments for marijuana legalization to ever come from a high-level politician.
creator: Christopher Ingraham

title: Colorado sets record with $117M in weed sales for April
description: Colorados monthly cannabis sales have reached a new apex in the legal era with a record-setting $117.4 million worth of flower, edibles and concentrates sold in April 2016. Colorado has now exceeded $100 million in monthly marijuana sales three times. FULL REPORT
creator: Aleta Labak

title: 175 million Americans have access to medical pot. Why doesnt the DEA consider it medicine?
description: Pressure is mounting on the federal government to update decades-old marijuana policy. Pot is still listed as a Schedule 1 drug, next to heroin.
creator: Christopher Ingraham

title: Michigan marijuana legalization doesnt qualify for ballot, board rules
description: Michigans elections board says a ballot drive to legalize marijuana for recreational use did not collect enough valid voter signatures to qualify for a statewide vote in November.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: North Carolina House gives prelim OK for industrial hemp research study
description: The House Agriculture Committee in North Carolina approved a bill Thursday allowing for state land grant universities to grow hemp through pilot programs.
creator: Anna Gronewold

title: S 02, Ep 09: She gives advice on weed issues; He makes vapes in California
description: Featured guests: Ask The Cannabist columnist Susan Squibb and Bloom Farms founder Mike Ray. [podcast] LOTS TO TALK ABOUT  Advice for parents about teen pot use.  The social cannabis scene and getting an inside peek into Colorado industry events.  Whats in the way of California legalizing marijuana
creator: Vincent Chandler

title: Milestone time: Alaska hands out first batch of marijuana biz licenses
description: Cheers and applause greeted Alaska marijuana regulators as they granted the states first cannabis business license. Its a marijuana testing facility, CannTest LLC of Anchorage.
creator: Becky Bohrer

title: Agents raid 10 Oakland marijuana grow houses linked to Mexican cartel
description: At least 15 people were arrested, and authorities seized hundreds of pounds of marijuana with an estimated street value of nearly $4 million.
creator: Harry Harris

title: Louisiana protects medical pot patients from prosecution
description: Gov. John Bel Edwards has agreed to match drug laws to conform with the Louisiana medical marijuana program, so someone who gets pot legally cant be prosecuted.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: Room of pot goes up in smoke in fire at home on High Street
description: Some headlines just write themselves. A roomful of marijuana has gone up in smoke during a fire at a house on High Street in a New York town.
creator: By The Associated Press

title: High court hears arguments over legalizing Massachusetts recreational pot
description: Voters who signed petitions backing a proposal to legalize Massachusetts recreational marijuana were misled, a lawyer argued before the states highest court . A lack of ballot language about marijuana-infused foods and beverages drew court scrutiny.
creator: Bob Salsberg

title: Welcome, Ohio: Now 25 states have legalized medical marijuana
description: Gov. John Kasich has signed legislation legalizing Ohio medical marijuana, though patients shouldnt expect to get it from dispensaries here anytime soon.
creator: Ann Sanner

title: Oregon races to finalize rules for recreational marijuana, issue licenses
description: After months of public hearings with pot growers, lawmen, public health officials and others, an Oregon commission is racing to finalize recreational marijuana regulations and issue licenses to hundreds of businesses within a few months.
creator: Andrew Selsky
